content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":48791,"originalJapaneseLine":"（くっ……！　なんて化け物っ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"(Guh...! What a monster...!"},{"lineNumber":48792,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんなやつが……！）","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone like this...!)"},{"lineNumber":48793,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――――おい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"――――Hey\""},{"lineNumber":48794,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...!\""},{"lineNumber":48795,"originalJapaneseLine":"表情を消したランスが長い蛇頭を踏みにじり、","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance, expressionless, crushed the long snake head underfoot,"},{"lineNumber":48796,"originalJapaneseLine":"音もなく退こうとしたメディウサの動きを止めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and stopped Medusa's movement as she tried to silently retreat."},{"lineNumber":48797,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっさんやブスやばばあを","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't care how many old men, ugly women, or old hags you kill—"},{"lineNumber":48798,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いくら殺そうが構わんが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't mind how many you kill...\""},{"lineNumber":48799,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………貴様は許さん！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...But I will never forgive YOU!!\""},{"lineNumber":48800,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、っ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...!\""},{"lineNumber":48801,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔剣の先端が、ケーキに入れたナイフのように、","translatedEnglishLine":"The tip of the demon sword, like a knife cutting into a cake,"},{"lineNumber":48802,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっさりと、深々と魔人の胸元を貫いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"pierced easily and deeply through the demon's chest."},{"lineNumber":48803,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……あ、あぁ、っ…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aah... ah, aah...!\""},

{"lineNumber":48804,"originalJapaneseLine":"信じられないものを見るように、","translatedEnglishLine":"As if seeing something unbelievable,"},

{"lineNumber":48805,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサの両眼が見開かれて…………","translatedEnglishLine":"Medusa's eyes widened... "},

{"lineNumber":48806,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのまま、魔人は崩れ落ちた。","translatedEnglishLine":"And with that, the demon collapsed."},

{"lineNumber":48807,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして。首都・ラグナロックアーク――","translatedEnglishLine":"And then. The capital, Ragnarockark――"},

{"lineNumber":48808,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がーーーーーっははははははははは！！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahahahahahaha!!"},

{"lineNumber":48809,"originalJapaneseLine":"　押っせ押せ押せーーーい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Push, push, pushーーー!\" "},

{"lineNumber":48810,"originalJapaneseLine":"首都ラグナロックアークは、","translatedEnglishLine":"The capital Ragnarockark was,"},

{"lineNumber":48811,"originalJapaneseLine":"集結したゼス軍と、それを率いるランスによって","translatedEnglishLine":"under relentless attack from the assembled Zeth army led by Lance,"},

{"lineNumber":48812,"originalJapaneseLine":"休む間もなく攻められていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"with no time to rest."},

{"lineNumber":48813,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔人メディウサはくたばったぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The demon Medusa is dead!"},

{"lineNumber":48814,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今こそ仕返しの大チャーーンス！！","translatedEnglishLine":"Now is the great chance for revenge!!"},

{"lineNumber":48815,"originalJapaneseLine":"　かかれ者ども！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Charge, you bastards!\" "},

{"lineNumber":48816,"originalJapaneseLine":"「突撃！　私たちの王都を、取り戻すの！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Assault! We're reclaiming our royal capital!\" "},

{"lineNumber":48817,"originalJapaneseLine":"「雷軍、光軍、突撃する！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thunder army, Light army, charge!\" "},

{"lineNumber":48818,"originalJapaneseLine":"「炎軍も行くぜ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The Flame army is going too."},

{"lineNumber":48819,"originalJapaneseLine":"　街を焼き払っちまわないようにな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Make sure not to burn down the city!\" "},

{"lineNumber":48820,"originalJapaneseLine":"「氷軍、出撃！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ice army, deploy!"},

{"lineNumber":48821,"originalJapaneseLine":"　潜伏した敵兵も、見落とさないで！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't overlook any hidden enemy soldiers!\" "},

{"lineNumber":48822,"originalJapaneseLine":"守るべき王を、王都を、そして夥しい数の同胞を、","translatedEnglishLine":"The Zeth army's fighting spirit to protect their king, the capital,"},

{"lineNumber":48823,"originalJapaneseLine":"無残に蹂躙されてきたゼス軍の戦意が、","translatedEnglishLine":"and their countless comrades who had been cruelly trampled,"},

{"lineNumber":48824,"originalJapaneseLine":"無数の魔法となって炸裂する。","translatedEnglishLine":"exploded forth as countless spells."},

{"lineNumber":48825,"originalJapaneseLine":"幾度となく国土を踏みにじられてきた","translatedEnglishLine":"The mages who had many times seen their land trampled upon,"},

{"lineNumber":48826,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔法使いたちの、そしてそうではない者達の、","translatedEnglishLine":"and those who were not mages alike,"},

{"lineNumber":48827,"originalJapaneseLine":"逆襲の雄叫びが王都に轟いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"their roar of counterattack thundered throughout the capital."},

{"lineNumber":48828,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さーさー、アニスもいきますよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on, Anise, let's go too!"},

{"lineNumber":48829,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どかんといきますよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We're going to make a big bang!\" "},

{"lineNumber":48830,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日はLV3の魔法は使うんじゃないわよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't use level 3 magic today."},

{"lineNumber":48831,"originalJapaneseLine":"　王都を吹き飛ばしたら承知しないからね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I won't forgive you if you blow up the capital!\" "},

{"lineNumber":48832,"originalJapaneseLine":"「分かってますとも千鶴子様！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I understand perfectly, Chizuruko-sama!"},

{"lineNumber":48833,"originalJapaneseLine":"　建物を壊さないよう、今日は絶対零度縛りです！","translatedEnglishLine":"To avoid destroying buildings, today we're limiting ourselves to absolute zero magic!"},

{"lineNumber":48834,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ウスピラ様とおそろいですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just like Uspira-sama.\" "},

{"lineNumber":48835,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やめいっつっとろーが！　街中凍りつくわよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I told you to stop! You'll freeze the whole city!"},

{"lineNumber":48836,"originalJapaneseLine":"　広範囲魔法禁止！」","translatedEnglishLine":"No wide-area magic!\" "},

{"lineNumber":48837,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん。ざっとこんなもんか。勝ったな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph. That's roughly it. We've won.\" "},

{"lineNumber":48838,"originalJapaneseLine":"「戦意が違いますからね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because our fighting spirit is different."},

{"lineNumber":48839,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人が倒されたと知って、","translatedEnglishLine":"Many volunteered after learning the demon was defeated."},

{"lineNumber":48840,"originalJapaneseLine":"　志願してきた兵も多いですし」","translatedEnglishLine":"There are quite a few new recruits.\" "},

{"lineNumber":48841,"originalJapaneseLine":"「現金な奴らだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, they're all fair-weather types.\" "},

{"lineNumber":48842,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人の身では魔人には勝てない……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"People believed that humans couldn't defeat demons..."},

{"lineNumber":48843,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そう、心に刻み込まれた人が多かったんですよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Many had that belief deeply engraved in their hearts."},

{"lineNumber":48844,"originalJapaneseLine":"　総統がそれを覆したおかげです」","translatedEnglishLine":"Thanks to our leader overturning that belief.\" "},

{"lineNumber":48845,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まぁいいだろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, fine."},

{"lineNumber":48846,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺のために死ぬブ男なぞどうでもいい」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't care about dumb guys dying for me.\" "},

{"lineNumber":48847,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……機嫌が悪いですか、ランスさん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Are you in a bad mood, Lance-san?\" "},

{"lineNumber":48848,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんでもない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nothing."},

{"lineNumber":48849,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さーて、俺もちょっと前線に行くか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now then, I'll head to the front lines a bit.\" "},

{"lineNumber":48850,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、はいっ。お供します」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, yes. I'll accompany you.\" "}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （くっ……！　なんて化け物っ……！
こんなやつが……！）
表情を消したランスが長い蛇頭を踏みにじり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, expressionless, crushed the long snake head underfoot,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 音もなく退こうとしたメディウサの動きを止めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and stopped Medusa's movement as she tried to silently retreat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっさんやブスやばばあを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't care how many old men, ugly women, or old hags you kill—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いくら殺そうが構わんが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't mind how many you kill..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣の先端が、ケーキに入れたナイフのように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The tip of the demon sword, like a knife cutting into a cake,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっさりと、深々と魔人の胸元を貫いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: pierced easily and deeply through the demon's chest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 信じられないものを見るように、
メディウサの両眼が見開かれて…………
そのまま、魔人は崩れ落ちた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And with that, the demon collapsed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして。首都・ラグナロックアーク――
「がーーーーーっははははははははは！！
押っせ押せ押せーーーい！」
首都ラグナロックアークは、
集結したゼス軍と、それを率いるランスによって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: under relentless attack from the assembled Zeth army led by Lance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 休む間もなく攻められていた。
「魔人メディウサはくたばったぞ！
今こそ仕返しの大チャーーンス！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now is the great chance for revenge!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かかれ者ども！」
「突撃！　私たちの王都を、取り戻すの！」
「雷軍、光軍、突撃する！」
「炎軍も行くぜ。
街を焼き払っちまわないようにな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make sure not to burn down the city!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「氷軍、出撃！
潜伏した敵兵も、見落とさないで！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't overlook any hidden enemy soldiers!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 守るべき王を、王都を、そして夥しい数の同胞を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Zeth army's fighting spirit to protect their king, the capital,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無残に蹂躙されてきたゼス軍の戦意が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and their countless comrades who had been cruelly trampled,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無数の魔法となって炸裂する。
幾度となく国土を踏みにじられてきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The mages who had many times seen their land trampled upon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法使いたちの、そしてそうではない者達の、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and those who were not mages alike,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逆襲の雄叫びが王都に轟いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: their roar of counterattack thundered throughout the capital.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さーさー、アニスもいきますよ！
どかんといきますよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're going to make a big bang!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日はLV3の魔法は使うんじゃないわよ。
王都を吹き飛ばしたら承知しないからね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't forgive you if you blow up the capital!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「分かってますとも千鶴子様！
建物を壊さないよう、今日は絶対零度縛りです！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To avoid destroying buildings, today we're limiting ourselves to absolute zero magic!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウスピラ様とおそろいですね」
「やめいっつっとろーが！　街中凍りつくわよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I told you to stop! You'll freeze the whole city!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 広範囲魔法禁止！」
「ふん。ざっとこんなもんか。勝ったな」
「戦意が違いますからね。
魔人が倒されたと知って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many volunteered after learning the demon was defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 志願してきた兵も多いですし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are quite a few new recruits."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「現金な奴らだ」
「人の身では魔人には勝てない……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "People believed that humans couldn't defeat demons...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう、心に刻み込まれた人が多かったんですよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many had that belief deeply engraved in their hearts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統がそれを覆したおかげです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to our leader overturning that belief."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まぁいいだろう。
俺のために死ぬブ男なぞどうでもいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't care about dumb guys dying for me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……機嫌が悪いですか、ランスさん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Are you in a bad mood, Lance-san?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんでもない。
さーて、俺もちょっと前線に行くか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, I'll head to the front lines a bit."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、はいっ。お供します」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

こんなやつが……！）
表情を消したランスが長い蛇頭を踏みにじり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, expressionless, crushed the long snake head underfoot,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and stopped Medusa's movement as she tried to silently retreat.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't care how many old men, ugly women, or old hags you kill—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いくら殺そうが構わんが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't mind how many you kill..."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The tip of the demon sword, like a knife cutting into a cake,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっさりと、深々と魔人の胸元を貫いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: pierced easily and deeply through the demon's chest.

そのまま、魔人は崩れ落ちた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And with that, the demon collapsed.

「がーーーーーっははははははははは！！

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: under relentless attack from the assembled Zeth army led by Lance,

「魔人メディウサはくたばったぞ！
今こそ仕返しの大チャーーンス！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now is the great chance for revenge!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かかれ者ども！」
「突撃！　私たちの王都を、取り戻すの！」
「雷軍、光軍、突撃する！」
「炎軍も行くぜ。
街を焼き払っちまわないようにな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make sure not to burn down the city!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「氷軍、出撃！
潜伏した敵兵も、見落とさないで！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't overlook any hidden enemy soldiers!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 守るべき王を、王都を、そして夥しい数の同胞を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Zeth army's fighting spirit to protect their king, the capital,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無残に蹂躙されてきたゼス軍の戦意が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and their countless comrades who had been cruelly trampled,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無数の魔法となって炸裂する。
幾度となく国土を踏みにじられてきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The mages who had many times seen their land trampled upon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法使いたちの、そしてそうではない者達の、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and those who were not mages alike,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逆襲の雄叫びが王都に轟いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: their roar of counterattack thundered throughout the capital.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さーさー、アニスもいきますよ！
どかんといきますよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're going to make a big bang!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日はLV3の魔法は使うんじゃないわよ。
王都を吹き飛ばしたら承知しないからね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't forgive you if you blow up the capital!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「分かってますとも千鶴子様！
建物を壊さないよう、今日は絶対零度縛りです！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To avoid destroying buildings, today we're limiting ourselves to absolute zero magic!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウスピラ様とおそろいですね」
「やめいっつっとろーが！　街中凍りつくわよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I told you to stop! You'll freeze the whole city!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 広範囲魔法禁止！」
「ふん。ざっとこんなもんか。勝ったな」
「戦意が違いますからね。
魔人が倒されたと知って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many volunteered after learning the demon was defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 志願してきた兵も多いですし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are quite a few new recruits."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「現金な奴らだ」
「人の身では魔人には勝てない……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "People believed that humans couldn't defeat demons...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう、心に刻み込まれた人が多かったんですよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many had that belief deeply engraved in their hearts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統がそれを覆したおかげです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to our leader overturning that belief."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まぁいいだろう。
俺のために死ぬブ男なぞどうでもいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't care about dumb guys dying for me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……機嫌が悪いですか、ランスさん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Are you in a bad mood, Lance-san?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんでもない。
さーて、俺もちょっと前線に行くか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, I'll head to the front lines a bit."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、はいっ。お供します」
